name: .BITSBOARD File Extension
summary: Learn about .BITSBOARD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: To use a BITSBOARD file with Bitsboard (iOS), you must:
Rename the file to use the .zip extension.
Decompress the file with any Zip-decompression utility (such as 7-Zip or Apple Archive Utility).
Import the resulting board into Bitsboard via Dropbox (using the instructions found in section 11 C of Bitsboard's Getting Started guide).
